description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". One of a series of Magazine films depicting West Germany. Looks at the German Foundation for International Development, the Schiller National Museum, the Boeing 737, villages for uprooted children, the South German town of Rottweil, Wolfsburg - the town founded for the Volkswagon car, and a soccer match between Cologne and Stuttgart.
